roleset.name: cause to get involved, involvement
roleset.note: ENGAGE-V NOTES: The "typical example" usage is effectively "X engaged itself in Y".Bonus points for anyone who knows was coprology is. (from engage.01-v)
ENGAGEMENT-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to 'engage.01'. Vn classes amalgamate-22.2-3-2 and amuse-31.1. Framed by Katie. (from engagement.01-n)
ENGAGED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to engage.01-v and engagement.01-n. (from engaged.01-j)

example.name: engage-v: typical usage in financial corpus
example.text: Some traders point out that as the big brokerage firms back out of program trading for their own accounts or for clients, opportunities increase for others to engage in the controversial practice.

example.name: engage-v: passivized or adjectival
example.text: Jefferies, [a Los Angeles holding company]-1 primarily engaged *trace*-1 in securities trading, also said stock market declines since the quarter ended Sept. 30 created an unrealizedpretax loss of about $6 million in its risk arbitrage account.

example.name: engage-v: clear example of all args
example.text: John engaged Mary in an endless discussion of coprology.
example.arg: in an endless discussion of coprology

roleset.name: betrothal, engaged to be married
roleset.note: ENGAGEMENT-N NOTES: Split from original .01 roleset by Julia for unification.
ENGAGED-J-J NOTES: Split from original .01 roleset by Julia for unification.

example.name: engaged-j
example.text: PT is engaged to be married on 12/17/05.

example.name: engagement-n
example.text: Diana's selection of this ring for her engagement to the future King of the United Kingdom resulted in sensation...
example.arg: to the future King of the United Kingdom
